author: Stephen Sorace
title: Coronavirus outbreak sees surge in reckless driving on America’s empty roadways
description: As millions of Americans hunker down at home during the coronavirus pandemic, many states are seeing an increase in reckless driving on now-empty roadways nationwide.
content:
